string.text: Grants Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting.
Grants Extra Arrows.
Stronger Javelins
Replaces Voulge with Military Bill, a polearm.
Replaces Menavlion with Long Menavlion, longer but slower.
Replaces Shield with a larger shield.
Longer Sword
Heavier Crossbow
Replaces Menavlion with Heavy Menavlion, slower but deals more damage.
Grants Eastern Long Spear, a two handed long spear.
Grants Pilas, longer, good for harrassing, can be used in melee, low in quantity.
Replaces Voulge with Two Handed Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting, two handed.
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.

Throwing Spears
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.

Faster Bolts
Replaces Recurve Bow with Imperial Superior Bow, faster but less accurate.

Replaces Higland Spear with Highland Long Spear, longer but deals less damage.

Replaces Hunting Bow with Imperial Superior Bow, faster but less accurate.
